title: One World, One Sun, One Grid: All about India's ambitious renewable project OSOWOG
description: The 2023-24 Economic Survey, presented by Nirmala Sitharaman and authored by V Anantha Nageswaran, highlights the OSOWOG initiative for solar energy. Launched at COP26 with the UK, it aims to interconnect global energy grids, targeting 500 GW by 2030 and 2,600 GW by 2050, emphasizing innovation and clean technology deployment.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
